### Interactive Exercise 1
<ExerciseComponent
  exercise={{
    id: 'ex-chapter-template-001',
    type: 'multiple-choice',
    question: 'What is the primary focus of this chapter?',
    options: [
      { value: 'A', text: 'Basic definitions only' },
      { value: 'B', text: 'Complex theoretical concepts' },
      { value: 'C', text: 'Practical applications of concepts' },
      { value: 'D', text: 'Historical context' }
    ],
    correctAnswers: ['C'],
    description: 'Test your understanding of the chapter\'s main focus.',
    solution: 'The chapter focuses on practical applications of the concepts covered.',
    explanation: 'This chapter emphasizes applying theoretical concepts to practical scenarios, which is why option C is correct.'
  }}
/>

### Interactive Exercise 2
<ExerciseComponent
  exercise={{
    id: 'ex-chapter-template-002',
    type: 'multiple-select',
    question: 'Which of the following are key concepts covered in this chapter?',
    options: [
      { value: 'concept1', text: 'Concept 1' },
      { value: 'concept2', text: 'Concept 2' },
      { value: 'concept3', text: 'Concept 3' },
      { value: 'concept4', text: 'Concept 4' }
    ],
    correctAnswers: ['concept1', 'concept3'],
    description: 'Identify the key concepts from this chapter.',
    solution: 'Concept 1 and Concept 3 are the main concepts covered in this chapter.',
    explanation: 'While all concepts may be mentioned, only Concepts 1 and 3 are central to the chapter material.'
  }}
/>

### Interactive Exercise 3
<ExerciseComponent
  exercise={{
    id: 'ex-chapter-template-003',
    type: 'multiple-choice',
    question: 'How can you apply the concepts from this chapter?',
    options: [
      { value: 'A', text: 'Through practical exercises' },
      { value: 'B', text: 'By reading only' },
      { value: 'C', text: 'Through memorization' },
      { value: 'D', text: 'Through theoretical study alone' }
    ],
    correctAnswers: ['A'],
    description: 'Consider the best approach to apply the chapter concepts.',
    solution: 'The concepts are best applied through practical exercises that reinforce the learning.',
    explanation: 'Application involves practical exercises that help solidify understanding.'
  }}
/>
